mapper.select: select b.*, u.u_image, u.nickname, u.introduce, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS r from board b, (SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R, (select target from follower where follower=#{id}) a,users u where b.id=a.target and b.id=u.id order by b_no desc limit 0,5

select r.* from (select b.*, u.u_image, u.nickname, u.introduce, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS r from board b, (SELECT @rownum :=0) AS R, (select target from follower where follower=#{id}) a,users u where b.id=a.target and b.id=u.id) r where r<=#{r} and r>#{r}-5 order by b_no desc
select count(*) from follower where follower=#{id};
